sentences: Ta ütlesite mulle tõhusalt oma teada. (He told me efficiently what he knows.)
Rohkem ei ütlesite midagi. (You didn't say anything more.)
Pean täpsustama: nad ei ütlesite maale midagi. (I have to clarify: they said nothing to the police.)
context: 'ütlesite' is the past tense, plural form of 'to say/tell'. It's used when referring to a group or formal address.
